New York University Archives
Charles Fogelman Collection on the Undergraduate Athletic Association
Fogelman, Charles
MC.333
1.75 linear feet in 1 oversize flat box and 2 folders in shared housing
1933-circa 1960s Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access. This collection includes materials collected and used by Charles Fogelman (1966 graduate of NYU) during his tenure as an officer of the Undergraduate Athletic Organization at NYU. Materials include a felt banner, a commemorative beret, an NYU songbook used by the organist at Madison Square Garden during NYU basketball games, and a recording of the NYU Glee Club. The Undergraduate Athletic Organization was organized in the early 1960s by students at the University Heights campus to support athletic teams, primarily the men's basketball team (which at that time competed in NCAA Division I). Members of the organization assisted with ticket sales at athletic games and distributed pins and other materials to attendees during games. The banner that comprises part of the collection was taken to games and was at the final game played at MSG.
Scope and Contents
This collection includes materials collected and used by Charles Fogelman during his tenure as an officer of the Undergraduate Athletic Organization at NYU. Materials include a felt banner, a commemorative beret, an NYU songbook used by the organist at Madison Square Garden during NYU basketball games, and a recording of the NYU Glee Club. The banner that comprises part of the collection was taken to games and was at the final NYU men's basketball game played at MSG.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Charles Fogelman in August 2019; the accession number associated with this gift is 2023.017.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Charles Fogelman Collection on the Undergraduate Athletic Association; MC 333; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning, materials were rehoused in archival folders and boxes, and described on the collection-level with an item-level inventory. The banner and beret were frozen and rehoused by conservators as a preventive measure.
